title: 008 - Laura C - Phone Calls, Songwriting, and Yorkies
description:
Tim welcomes artist and long time friend, Laura C. They discuss songwriting, verbal vomit, bossy songs, and Ironman figurines. Tim's wife, Heather, and Caleb are along for the ride. A British guy reads country music lyrics, yorkies attack, and Tim looks up cathartic in the dictionary.
 This episode features Laura C's song "Broken Open" from her album "The Gift of Brokenness".
 Get more of Laura C on iTunes
 or listen to her music on ReverbNation
 Don't forget to chat us up @poddybreak
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: If you do-on't, then you wo-on't...
